EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_PCF 1.6 Launch_Q415.Follow Up - No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: We're sorry we missed you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Sorry we missed you for last week's webinar Expand Your Cloud Native Platform's Capabilities With The Newest Release of Pivotal Cloud Foundry. We reviewed how the latest release brings together the key principles of modern Cloud Native software development into a turnkey platform and brings you frameworks for the latest architectural styles. Some of the new capabilities and features available are:
- Integrated Microservices with Spring Cloud Services <https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/now-available-spring-cloud-services-for-pivotal-cloud-foundry> - Native Support for .NET and Docker <https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/pivotal-cloud-foundry-1-6-technical-blog-new-runtime-services-net-more> - Continuous Delivery <http://pivotal.io/platform/press-release/go-from-idea-to-production-in-less-than-a-day> of your Cloud Native Applications - Pivotal Cloud Foundry on Microsoft Azure <https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/general-availability-of-cloud-foundry-and-preview-access-of-pivotal-cloud-foundry/>
Want to learn more?
- Check out the replay <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/expand-your-cloud-native-platform> and slides <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/expand-your-cloud-native-platforms-enterprise-capabilities-with-the-newest-release-of-pivotal-cloud-foundry> - Read more <https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/talking-pivotal-cloud-foundry-1-6-with-james-watters> about the new version with James Watters - Download <https://network.pivotal.io/products/pivotal-cf> Pivotal Cloud Foundry - Register for Part 2 <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-working-with-legacy-it> of our series: Ensuring Cloud Native Success - Working with Legacy IT
We hope you can join us next time!
The Pivotal Team
